name: nemeFISH
description:
This fishing game was created as a final project for Selected Topics in Game Engineering class of the Alpen-Adria-University using Unity. It is only a prototype to show how the gameplay works, many features are not included. 

How to play:

  • Use any button to move your fishing hook up and down and align it with the fish in order to catch it
  • Your catching progress is the middle bottom bar
  •  The time you have to catch it is the middle top bar
